H0.text: Wood smoke contributes most to the greenhouse effect.

H1.text: Nitrous oxides contribute most to the greenhouse effect.

H2.text: Carbon dioxide contributes most to the greenhouse effect.

H3.text: Nuclear radiation contributes most to the greenhouse effect.

A4.text: Burning fossil fuels is the main cause of these increased CO2 concentrations, which are the primary cause of climate change.
